content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: RenewCertificate path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/certificates/{certificate_id}/renew content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name certificateid
desc a certificate id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum renew a certificate
desc stackpath automatically renews certificates that are 30 days from expiration call this to retry a renewal that previously failed
responses
title: 23_SSL_RenewCertificate_142.json
